text: This is a list of cities in Portugal. ==List== Crest City Municipality PopulationAlthough the cities list doesn't indicate the cities' population, it indicates the parishes that compose them, therefore, this number is the sum of the population of the parishes. The population data was taken from the National Association of Portuguese Municipalities and is from 2004.
